name: Marina Boat Traffic Control: The Puzzle Water Ship Saga - Free edition
name_original: Marina Boat Traffic Control: The Puzzle Water Ship Saga - Free edition
description:
TRY OUR MARINA BOAT TRAFFIC CONTROL : THE PUZZLE WATER SHIP SAGA GAME

In this game you have huge yacht to take out from the marina. You will get many obstacles on your way like boats, other ships and many more. So avoid those obstacles to reach your target.

Don't cash with other boats otherwise you loose the game.

How to play?

- Lead the boat to move forward
- Avoid the obstacles on your way
- Reach to you target

So be ready to solve this amazing puzzle! be ready to being smart!

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> MARINA BOAT TRAFFIC CONTROL : THE PUZZLE WATER SHIP SAGA GAME

We want your feedbacks! Let's work together to improve your game experience!
